divs: Sighting Details(My english is60nt very good, because IB4m a german boy!)1. I was in a car and heard music with my CD-player.2. Istared at the objekt and could60nt move and speak.3. I thought, this is a plane, but a sekunde later, Idropped this idea.4. I was paralized, I could60nt mover and speak. And I was scared. After the sightning, I could mover, butI was scared. I thought: when i told this other people, they lought about me!Because that, I heard music and did60nt tell it to other people.5. It was north-west of me and flies slowly towest. It was blue, oval, and had a corona of blue light around itself. It glowedblue. After 20-25 seconds, the objekt sparkled one turn blue and acceleratedwith an incredible speed and raced to west and stepped.6. It raced so fast, thatI lost sight of the objekt after two or three seconds!
